author: dain
msg: Fix GERONIMO-2800 when connections are closed or destroyed do not reassociate the connection again or throw an exception.  Instead simply invoke the handle and let the handle throw the exception.
Do not proxy DisassociatableManagedConnections since they will automatically associate on use.
